text: Ozark, incorporated in 1890, is a city in Christian County, Missouri, United States. The population was 21,284 at the 2020 census. It is the county seat of Christian County. Ozark is part of the Springfield, Missouri metropolitan area, and is centered along a business loop of U.S. Route 65, where it crosses Missouri Route 14. It is south of Springfield, Missouri and north of Branson. ==History== Ozark was named from the Ozark Mountains, in which it is located. == References == Category:Cities in Missouri Category:Ozarks Category:1890 establishments in the United States Category:County seats in Missouri Category:Christian County, Missouri Category:1890s establishments in Missouri Category:Settlements in Christian County, Missouri
title: Ozark, Missouri
